Carnot Settings Sign Up Sign In OR Name Enter Your Full Name Email ID Email ID/Mobile No Enter Email ID Enter Email ID/Mobile No Should be at least 8 characters Password Enter Password Already have account, Sign in SIGN IN Send One-time-password SMS Forgot Password Car Garage Friends Welcome %1$s All you need is... You will need a new adapter for every car that you want to add. Carnot Adapter Active internet connection to sync your carnot adapter. Internet Access Car Keys You will need car keys to plug-in the device. Get Started Safety First In case of emergency or accidents, your emergency contacts will be notified of your location, and other details. Contact 1 Contact 2 Contact 3 Select Contact Car Info. Tell us about your car. Nickname Name your car! License No. Enter License Number Make Brand Model Plug-In Adapter Insert the Carnot adapter in the OBD port of your car. Need Help? Contact Us Bluetooth Settings Turn Bluetooth On. Carnot adapter needs to pair with your phone to activate. Bluetooth Device setup Enter your 16-digit device passcode. Next Finish Previous

Auto Dismiss Welcome Message get recent trip last call timestamp set alarm for trip syncing No internet connection found ! Welcome %1$s, It\'s nice to finally talk to you! This card is where I will talk with you. \nI\'m scanning for GSM signal and GPS satellites. It can take up to 10 mins since this is the first time GPS signal locked! Now you can see my %1$s locations on the maps anytime :) Oops, %1$s lost GPS signal. Searching for satellites. The current location is from GSM which may have some inaccuracy Oops, %1$s lost GPS signal. Searching for satellites. The current location is from GSM which may have some inaccuracy Have you entered any car documents for your car (%1$s) ? Please enter your Car Details here. %1$s, I am not able to catch a GPS signal. Can you move me to a location open to sky and just let me try for 15 mins. \n \nIt\'s hard to catch a signal if there are obstructions like in a basement of between several large buildings.Contact us for additional help [here] Oops, %1$s, I\'ve lost GPS signal. The current location is via GSM. It may be a little inaccurate. But worry not, I am still protected and will let you know of any trouble %1$s, we have a small problem. I\'ve lost location. The one on map is last know location. I can still send you security alerts though. I should get back location in some time.
Welcome %1$s, It\'s all good here :) Please enable your mobile internet, to connect with me.
Welcome %1$s, It\'s nice to finally talk to you! This card is where I will talk with you.\n I\'m scanning for mobile network and GPS satellites. It can take up to 15 mins since this is the first time Welcome %1$s, It\'s nice to finally talk to you! This card is where I will talk with you.\n I\'ve got mobile network. Now scanning for GPS satellites. This can take up to 15 mins since it\'s the first time GPS signal locked! Now you can see my locations on the maps anytime :) %1$s, I have lost network. It happens in areas with poor network signal like basements. I may not be able to alert you in case of an issue till I get into network" I have read and agree to abide by the {Terms of Service} and [Privacy policy] for using Carnot. All Time Drive score Total Distance (km) All Time Mileage
Geofencing Name Accident Alert Towings Alerts Vandalism Alerts In case of an accident, we inform 3 emergency contacts with location of accident.
Welcome %1$s, It\'s nice to finally talk to you!\nI\'m scanning for mobile network and GPS satellites. It can take up to 15 mins since this is the first time Welcome %1$s, GPS signal locked! Now you can track me on the map below anytime. Hello %1$s, I am not able to catch a GPS signal. Can you move me to a location open to sky and let me try for another 15 mins. It\'s hard to catch a signal if there are obstructions like in a basement of between several large buildings. Welcome %1$s, I\'ve got mobile network. Now scanning for GPS satellites. This can take up to 15 mins since it\'s the first time
I\'m not in mobile network range. I cannot alert you in case of an issue till I get back in network I\'ve lost location signal. The location on map is last known. I am still able to alert you in case of an issue Oops, I\'ve lost GPS signal. The current location is approximate. I am still able to alert you in case of an issue Hello %1$s, It\'s all good here :)
Hello %1$s, No internet connection on mobile. Please connect to the internet to track me.
I\'m going for a ride! Enable Bluetooth [here] to check out the live dashboard. I\'m going for a ride! Enable location [here] to check out the live dashboard. I\'m going for a ride! Enable {Bluetooth} and [location] to check out the live dashboard I\'m going for a ride! Check out the live dashboard [here]. I\'m going for a ride!
